Title: RSS and Atom for digital minimalists - blog.dornea.nu
Description:
Digital Minimalism A few days after I have started working on this post, I begun reading Cal Newport‚Äôs Digital Minimalism book and quickly realized how both topics interrelate to each other. But now one by one:
 Digital minimalism is a philosophy of technology use in which you focus your entire time on a small number of carefully selected and optimized activities to strongly support things you value and happily miss out everything else.

Title: Why Vim syntax highlighting breaks sometimes
Description: Vim was my preferred text editor for nearly eighteen years, until I switched to aretext in 2021. I appreciated vim‚Äôs efficiency and ubiquity, the way I could rely on it regardless of what project I was working on or what machine I had ssh‚Äôd into. Like any software, however, vim reflects the time in which it was written. In many cases, vim optimizes for speed above all else, an approach that made sense given the limitations of late ‚Äô90s computers.

Title: Head girl and head boy - Wikipedia
Description: Head boy and head girl are student leadership roles in schools, representing the school's entire student body. They are normally the most senior prefects in the school. The terms are commonly used in the British education system as well as in Australia and private schools throughout the Commonwealth. Some schools use alternative titles such as school captain.
